definition: (of watercourses) source and direction of flow/origin and development
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: This is the ancient origins of the rise of Buddhism and Taoism in the pre-existing folk activities.
sentences.chinese: 这是源流古者在佛道教兴起前就有的民俗活动。

sentences.english: The Korean and Chinese cultures are similar.
sentences.chinese: 韩国与中国的文化源流有颇多相似之处。

sentences.english: Relax, play, it will start to flow.
sentences.chinese: 放松，玩，它会开启创意源流。

sentences.english: Both of them have deep relations with the "Nuo"dance in ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 它们与古傩都有着深远的源流关系。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the academic characteristics of Lu s traumatology .
sentences.chinese: 介绍陆氏伤科的学术源流。

sentences.english: Carrying on a research to it, we must investigate the name and the material object together, and clarify the source and course.
sentences.chinese: 对之进行研究，必须名实同步考察，源流一并弄清。

sentences.english: The origin of Japanese Waka can be traced to the poem of ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 日本歌论的源流可以追溯到中国古代的诗论。

sentences.english: Chinese guqin culture has a long tradition and standing.
sentences.chinese: 中国古琴文化传统浓厚，源流悠长。

sentences.english: Chapter 1 involves examining the origin and development of Matchmaker.
sentences.chinese: 第一章重在探讨“媒妁”的源流辨析问题。

sentences.english: Hast thou entered into the depths of the sea, and walked in the lowest parts of the deep?
sentences.chinese: 你曾否到过海的源流，走过深渊的底处？

sentences.english: Akesu River is the maximum runoff source flows of Tarim River.
sentences.chinese: 阿克苏河是塔里木河来水量最大的源流。

sentences.english: From the third to the fifth volume, the author tests and distinguishes the origin of 29 melodies.
sentences.chinese: 第三至五卷考辨唐以来29个燕乐曲调源流。

sentences.english: Chapter 3 focuses on the history of the Qiu Family and its development over time.
sentences.chinese: 第三章上杭丘姓的历史源流及其发展过程。

definition: branch or subdivision of a family
see 追根溯源[zhui1 gen1 su4 yuan2]
evolution of sth over time/course of development/history
genealogy/family tree/same as 譜牒|谱牒
